testCase.name: WordCounter should count words in the document
WordCounter shouldn't count newlines, spaces or tabs
WordCounter shouldn't count punctuation or other symbols as words
Markdown parser should parse headers correctly
Markdown parser should parse formatted paragraphs correctly
Markdown parser should parse an ordered list correctly
Markdown parser should parse an unordered list correctly
Markdown parser should parse nested lists correctly
Markdown parser should output Html code correctly
Markdown parser should output the same source when calling toMarkDown() after parsing
Markdown parser should correctly convert markdown to formatless string
Markdown parser should parse the right source positions
Test Header should set left text in header
Test Zoom begins with zoom set to 1.0
Test Zoom does not zoom the zoom buttons
Test Zoom can zoom in
Test Zoom can zoom out
Test Zoom doesn't go below minimum zoom
Test Zoom doesn't go above maximum zoom
Test Zoom invokes handleZoomIn on zoom-in button click
Test Zoom invokes handleZoomOut on zoom-out button click
Test sidebar opens and closes when clicked
Test sidebar tracks mouse hovering and leaving the sidebar area
Test sidebar updates state with info filled into fields
